member.name: T:EventTracing.ClockResolution
member.summary: The clock resolution used during tracing.

member.name: F:EventTracing.ClockResolution.QueryPerformanceCounter
member.summary: Query performance counter (QPC). The QPC counter provides a high-resolution time stamp that is not affected by adjustments to the system clock.

member.name: F:EventTracing.ClockResolution.SystemTime
member.summary: System time. The system time provides a time stamp that tracks changes to the systemâ€™s clock.

member.name: F:EventTracing.ClockResolution.CpuCycleCounter
member.summary: CPU cycle counter. The CPU counter provides the highest resolution time stamp and is the least resource-intensive to retrieve. However, the CPU counter is unreliable and should not be used in production.

member.name: T:EventTracing.EtwProvider
member.summary: Represents an ETW event provider.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwProvider.Name
member.summary: The name of the provider (may be null).

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwProvider.Id
member.summary: The ID of the provider.

member.name: M:EventTracing.EtwProvider.#ctor(System.Guid)
member.summary: Creates a provider with the specified ID and no name.

member.name: M:EventTracing.EtwProvider.#ctor(System.String,System.Guid)
member.summary: Creates a provider with a specified name and ID.

member.name: M:EventTracing.EtwProvider.GetProviderForEventSource(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the provider that corresponds to an EventSource.
member.param: The name of the event source.

member.name: M:EventTracing.EtwProvider.GetInstanceInfos
member.summary: Returns information about instance of the provider.

member.name: M:EventTracing.EtwProvider.GetPublishedProviders
member.summary: Returns a list of all published providers on the system.
member.returns: The published providers on the system.

member.name: M:EventTracing.EtwProvider.GetRegisteredProviders
member.summary: Returns a list of all providers registered on the system.
member.returns: The registered providers on the system.

member.name: T:EventTracing.EtwProvider.InstanceInfo
member.summary: Information about an instance of this provider.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwProvider.InstanceInfo.ProcessId
member.summary: The process ID of the instance.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwProvider.InstanceInfo.Properties
member.summary: Properties of the instance.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwProvider.InstanceInfo.EnableInfos
member.summary: Information about each way the provider was enabled.

member.name: T:EventTracing.EtwProvider.EnableInfo
member.summary: Information about an instance of a provider being enabled.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwProvider.EnableInfo.Level
member.summary: The information level enabled.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwProvider.EnableInfo.EnableProperty
member.summary: Optional properties that are enabled.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwProvider.EnableInfo.MatchAnyKeyword
member.summary: Bitmask of keywords that determine the category of events the provider should write.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwProvider.EnableInfo.MatchAllKeyword
member.summary: Restricts the category of events that the provider should write.

member.name: T:EventTracing.EtwSession
member.summary: Represents an ETW session.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Id
member.summary: The GUID of the session.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Name
member.summary: The name of the session.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.ClockResolution
member.summary: The clock resolution used by the session.

member.name: M:EventTracing.EtwSession.GetProperties
member.summary: Gets properties of the session.

member.name: M:EventTracing.EtwSession.GetStatistics
member.summary: Gets statistics of the session.

member.name: M:EventTracing.EtwSession.GetAllSessions
member.summary: Gets all ETW sessions the user has access to.

member.name: M:EventTracing.EtwSession.GetSession(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the session with the given name.
member.returns: The session, if found, null otherwise.

member.name: T:EventTracing.EtwSession.Properties
member.summary: Properties of the session.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Properties.BufferSize
member.summary: Amount of memory allocated for each event tracing session buffer, in kilobytes.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Properties.MinimumBuffers
member.summary: Minimum number of buffers allocated for the event tracing session's buffer pool.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Properties.MaximumBuffers
member.summary: Maximum number of buffers allocated for the event tracing session's buffer pool.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Properties.MaximumFileSize
member.summary: Maximum size of the file used to log events, in megabytes.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Properties.LogFileMode
member.summary: Logging modes for the event tracing session.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Properties.FlushTimer
member.summary: How often, in seconds, the trace buffers are forcibly flushed.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Properties.SystemTraceProvidersEnabled
member.summary: Which kernel events should be included in the trace.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Properties.LogFileName
member.summary: The name of the log file.

member.name: T:EventTracing.EtwSession.Statistics
member.summary: Statistics about the session.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Statistics.NumberOfBuffers
member.summary: The number of buffers allocated for the event tracing session's buffer pool.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Statistics.FreeBuffers
member.summary: The number of buffers that are allocated but unused in the event tracing session's buffer pool.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Statistics.EventsLost
member.summary: The number of events that were not recorded.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Statistics.BuffersWritten
member.summary: The number of buffers written.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Statistics.LogBuffersLost
member.summary: The number of buffers that could not be written to the log file.

member.name: P:EventTracing.EtwSession.Statistics.RealTimeBuffersLost
member.summary: The number of buffers that could not be delivered in real-time to the consumer.

member.name: T:EventTracing.LogFileMode
member.summary: Flags for how events are logged.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.FileModeNone
member.summary: No flags.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.FileModeSequential
member.summary: Writes events to a log file sequentially; stops when the file reaches its maximum size.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.FileModeCircular
member.summary: Writes events to a log file. After the file reaches the maximum size, the oldest events are replaced with incoming events.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.FileModeAppend
member.summary: Appends events to an existing sequential log file. If the file does not exist, it is created.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.FileModeNewFile
member.summary: Automatically switches to a new log file when the file reaches the maximum size.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.FileModePreAllocate
member.summary: Reserves the maximum file size of disk space for the log file in advance.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.NonStoppableMode
member.summary: The logging session cannot be stopped.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.SecureMode
member.summary: Restricts who can log events to the session.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.RealTimeMode
member.summary: Delivers the events to consumers in real-time. Events are delivered when the buffers are flushed, not at the time the provider writes the event.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.DelayOpenFileMode
member.summary: Delay opening the log file until an event occurs.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.BufferingMode
member.summary: This mode writes events to a circular memory buffer. Events written beyond the total size of the buffer evict the oldest events still remaining in the buffer.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.PrivateLoggerMode
member.summary: Creates a user-mode event tracing session that runs in the same process as its event trace provider.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.AddHeaderMode
member.summary: Adds a header to the log file.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.UseKbytesForSize
member.summary: Use kilobytes as the unit of measure for specifying the size of a file. The default unit of measure is megabytes.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.UseGlobalSequence
member.summary: Uses sequence numbers that are unique across event tracing sessions.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.UseLocalSequence
member.summary: Uses sequence numbers that are unique only for an individual event tracing session.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.PrivateInProc
member.summary: Enforces that only the process that registered the provider GUID can start the logger session with that GUID.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.ModeReserved
member.summary: Signal heap and critical section tracing.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.StopOnHybridShutdown
member.summary: Stops logging on hybrid shutdown.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.PersistOnHybridShutdown
member.summary: Continues logging on hybrid shutdown.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.UsePagedMemory
member.summary: Uses paged memory.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.SystemLoggerMode
member.summary: Receive events from SystemTraceProvider.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.IndependentSessionMode
member.summary: A logging session should not be affected by EventWrite failures in other sessions.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.NoPerProcessorBuffering
member.summary: Writes events that were logged on different processors to a common buffer.

member.name: F:EventTracing.LogFileMode.AddToTriageDump
member.summary: Adds ETW buffers to triage dumps.

member.summary: File disk I/O.

member.summary: Physical disk I/O initialization.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.Dispatcher
member.summary: Scheduler/ReadyThread events.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.MemoryPageFaults
member.summary: All page faults.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.MemoryHardFaults
member.summary: Hard faults only.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.VirtualAlloc
member.summary: Virtual memory operations.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.Vamap
member.summary: Map/unmap (excluding images).

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.NetworkTcpip
member.summary: TCP/IP send and receieve.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.Registry
member.summary: Registry calls.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.DbgPrint
member.summary: DbgPrint calls.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.Job
member.summary: Job start and end.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.Alpc
member.summary: ALPC traces.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.SplitIo
member.summary: Split I/O traces.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.DebugEvents
member.summary: Debugger events.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.Driver
member.summary: Driver delays.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.Profile
member.summary: Sample-based profiling.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.FileIo
member.summary: File I/O.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.FileIoInit
member.summary: File I/O initialization.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.NoSysConfig
member.summary: Do not do system configuration rundown.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.ForwardWmi
member.summary: Can forward to WMI.

member.name: F:EventTracing.SystemTraceProvider.Extension
member.summary: Indicates more flags.

member.name: T:EventTracing.TraceInstanceProperties
member.summary: Properties of an instance of a trace provider.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceInstanceProperties.None
member.summary: None.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceInstanceProperties.Legacy
member.summary: This provider was registered using RegisterTraceGuids instead of EventRegister.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceInstanceProperties.PreEnabled
member.summary: This provider was enabled without being registered.

member.name: T:EventTracing.TraceLevel
member.summary: The level of detail provided by an event provider.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceLevel.Critical
member.summary: Abnormal exit or termination events.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceLevel.Error
member.summary: Severe error events.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceLevel.Warning
member.summary: Warning events such as allocation failures.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceLevel.Information
member.summary: Non-error events such as entry or exit events.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceLevel.Verbose
member.summary: Detailed trace events.

member.name: T:EventTracing.TraceProperties
member.summary: Additional properties that can be enabled for a provider.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceProperties.None
member.summary: None.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceProperties.SecurityIdentifier
member.summary: Include in the extended data the security identifier (SID) of the user.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceProperties.TerminalSessionIdentifier
member.summary: Include in the extended data the terminal session identifier.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceProperties.StackTrace
member.summary: Include in the extended data a call stack trace for events written using EventWrite.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceProperties.IgnoreKeyword0
member.summary: Filters out all events that do not have a non-zero keyword specified.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceProperties.ProviderGroup
member.summary: Indicates that this should enable a Provider Group rather than an individual Event Provider.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceProperties.ProcessStartKey
member.summary: Include the Process Start Key in the extended data.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceProperties.EventKey
member.summary: Include the Event Key in the extended data.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceProperties.ExcludeInPrivate
member.summary: Filters out all events that are either marked as an InPrivate event or come from a process that is marked as InPrivate.

member.name: F:EventTracing.TraceProperties.All
member.summary: All known properties.
